text: Baur au Lac, Zurich Baur au Lac is a luxury hotel at Talstrasse, Zürich, Switzerland. The hotel was founded in 1844 by Johannes Baur and is currently still held by the Baur family. It was completely renovated between 2008 and 2010. It is a member of the Leading Hotels of the World Consortium. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Hotels in Zürich Category:The Leading Hotels of the World
title: Baur au Lac
